question: Consider the following statements:  1. In the Ryotwari System , the Government retained the right to resume the land at will  2. In the Ryotwari System, the Government retained the right to enhance the land revenue at will  Which among the above is/ are correct statements?
explanation: As per the Ryotwari System, Peasants were made proprietors. The Ryotwari system allowed the state to deal directly with the cultivator (Ryot) for revenue collection.
